System only returns energy/equipment widgets (Grid Frequency, Core Temp, Power Factor). No people-related widgets visible on dashboard after multiple attempts and page refreshes. Elements list consistently empty, cannot detect or interact with widgets. Task requires workforce widgets to appear, but system does not render them."}
